item.title: Juniper OSPF Packet Types Study Notes
item.description: This post will take a quick look into the five types of OSPF packets. OSPF is a dynamic routing protocol used as an interior gateway protocol (IGP). Unlinke BGP which is implemented over TCP, OSPF is its own IP protocol (89) different from TCP or UDP. As such the protocol has its own packet formats which are all reviewed below.
